content: in this legal case the tribunal in palermo made several decisions they rejected an application for payment of a balance due by one party and declared a lien on the undivided shares of the estate the court ordered certain parties to pay specific amounts to the plaintiffs and dissolved the community inheritance dividing the estate among the parties the court also recognized the rights of mortgage creditors and ordered the payment of certain sums they rejected certain requests and declared that the costs of the litigation should be shared by the parties the tribunal heard the attorneys of the parties involved and made a final ruling declaring the application for payment of a balance due to be inadmissible they also declared a lien on the undivided shares of the estate of another party the tribunal ordered three parties to pay specific amounts to the plaintiffs along with legal interest and another party to pay a different amount to a specific plaintiff they rejected certain requests and declared the succession of a person open the court ordered the dissolution of the community inheritance related to the deceased persons assets and determined that the plaintiffs had to pay the defendants a settlement amount mortgage creditors would be satisfied with a specific sum owed by one of the parties the tribunal also ordered the setoff of litigation costs and expenses including the expenses of an expert report to be shared proportionally among the parties the decision was made on may 22 2023 and filed in the secretarys office on may 25 2023
